data.comment: The first-half is in progress. Beerschot get the game underway.
Goal! Beerschot have got their heads in front thanks to a Raphael Holzhauser strike.
In the minute 45, The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The second-half is underway. Brugge with the kick-off.
The away team replace Tarik Tissoudali with Blessing Eleke.
In the minute 59, Philippe Clement (Brugge) is making a first substitution, with David Okereke replacing Krepin Diatta.
Brugge make their second substitution with Charles De Ketelaere replacing Eduard Sobol.
The home team have replaced Siebe Schrijvers with Michael Krmencik. This is the third substitution made today by Philippe Clement.
In the minute 76, Eder Balanta (Brugge) has received a yellow card from Alexandre Boucaut.
Hernan Losada is making the team's second substitution at Jan Breydel Stadium with Dario Van Den Buijs replacing Raphael Holzhauser.
Jan Van den Bergh is replacing Yan Vorogovskiy for Beerschot at Jan Breydel Stadium.
